title: vaccine | Spiritual Healing ~ Delphinians Material
sitename: Spiritual Healing ~ Delphinians Material ~ Sacrad Tours Around the World
cleaned_text: 10 January 2020 New Year Reading with the Delphinians We are here with you, with each of you. We ask you to find yourself in a receptive manner, to open yourself. Don't be closed, closed legs, etc. For this is an energy transmission. You know that you don't have to be in the same room with us for us to access your energy field. Although your minds are very active, our intentions are to shift you energetically. Now there is a lot of talk about DNA, viruses, vaccines, fear, future, past....The moment is now. Now the atmosphere on the Planet Earth is more receptive or open for the activation of your accelerated energy fields. You are living in a dualistic environment, dualistic atmosphere. So, when something is going down, something else is going up. There is always going to be a balancing act in this dimension. Your individual responsibility
